name: task-board-app
description: Real-time collaborative task board with AI integration

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: rd /s /q node_modules 2>nul || echo. && rd /s /q frontend\node_modules 2>nul || echo. && rd /s /q backend\__pycache__ 2>nul || echo. && npm run install:all
